mapper.select: select seq, subject, content, name, reg_date, readCount from board;
mapper.insert: insert into board(seq, subject, content, name, reg_date, readCount) values (#{seq}, #{subject}, #{content}, #{name}, #{reg_date},0);
insert into board_reply (rseq, bseq, content, name, rep, reg_date, re_step, re_level) values (#{rseq}, #{bseq}, #{content}, #{name}, #{rep}, #{reg_date}, #{re_step}, #{re_level});
mapper.select: select seq, subject, content, name, reg_date, readCount from board where subject like CONCAT('%',#{subject},'%') order by seq desc
select seq, subject, content, name, reg_date, readCount from board order by seq desc limit #{skip},#{amount};
select count(*) from board where subject like CONCAT('%',#{subject},'%') order by seq desc;
select seq, subject, content, name, reg_date, readCount from board where subject like CONCAT('%',#{subject},'%') order by seq desc limit #{skip},#{amount};

select distinct subject from board where subject like CONCAT('%',#{subject},'%') order by case when subject = #{subject} then 0 when subject like CONCAT(#{subject},'%') then 1 when subject like CONCAT('%',#{subject},'%') then 2 when subject like CONCAT('%',#{subject}) then 3 else 4 end; ;
